description: This file implements a Dojo Object Store for local storage management of todo items, including methods for CRUD operations and querying.

classes.name: TodoLocalStorage
classes.description: A Dojo object store implementation for local storage of todo items, supporting CRUD and query operations.

methods.name: _loadStorage
methods.description: Loads and parses the todo data from local storage.

methods.name: _saveStorage
methods.description: Saves the todo data array to local storage.

methods.name: postscript
methods.description: Mixes properties into the store instance.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves an object by its ID from local storage.

methods.name: getIdentity
methods.description: Returns the identity property value of an object.

methods.name: put
methods.description: Stores or updates an object in local storage.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds a new object to local storage, throws error if object exists.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes an object by ID from local storage.

methods.name: query
methods.description: Queries objects based on a provided query object.
